text: The following list summarizes notable first ascents of mountains and peaks in the Cordillera Blanca in the Andes of Ancash, Peru, in chronological order. {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Date An asterisk indicates that this is only the date of the first recorded ascent. There is either evidence for an earlier ascent or earlier ascents are very likely. !! Peak !! Height (m) !! Height (ft) !! Route !! Climbers !! Nationality !! title: List of first ascents in the Cordillera Blanca
